TEXT: The applicant , Mr PERSON , is a NORP national , who was born in DATE and lives in GPE . He is represented before the ORG by Mr O. GPE , a lawyer practising in GPE .

The applicant used to be employed by the municipality of ORG as a civil servant in charge of a division ( työkeskus , arbetscentralen ) subordinated to ORG ( perusturvalautakunta , bastrygghetsnämnden ) . The applicant was , among other things , in charge of purchasing within that division . His post was , however , abolished and he was given notice on DATE due to economic reasons and a reorganisation of the organic chart of municipal staff . On DATE ORG confirmed his dismissal .

The applicant appealed to ORG of Oulu ( hallinto - oikeus , förvaltningsdomstolen ) , arguing , among other things , that the decision to dismiss him was unlawful , since he should instead have been given the post as head of purchasing , which was vacant at that time and which he had applied for . ORG , finding that the applicant should have been given another post within the municipality , overturned the decision on DATE .

However , the decision by ORG was overturned , by CARDINAL votes to CARDINAL , by ORG ( korkein hallinto - oikeus , högsta förvaltningsdomstolen ) on DATE . It found that there were no vacant posts available to the applicant as the municipality in DATE had decided not to fill the post as head of purchasing . Thus , the dismissal of the applicant became final .
No oral hearing was held at any time of the proceedings , nor did the applicant request that such a hearing be held . He was represented by counsel at least before ORG .
